summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.9°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9425 lux) and cloud levels (up 328 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14836 lux), cloud levels (up 1907 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and calm and still conditions are expected. Moderate rainfall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and light levels will be low during the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
